text: Apani taderake adamera du'i putrera bastaba abastha patha kare sunana. Yakhana tara bhaye'i kichu utsarga nibedana karechila, takhana tadera ekajanera utsarga grhita hayechila ebam aparajanera grhita hayani. Se balalah ami abasya'i tomake hatya karaba. Se balalah allaha dharmabhirudera paksa theke'i to grahana karena.
